name: 李穎玟
objective: The focused topics of the course are:1.First-Order ODEs 2. Second-Order Linear ODEs 3. Higher Order Linear ODEs 4. Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions 5. Laplace Transforms
schedule:
12-Sep　　Introduction 
19-Sep　　First-Order ODEs (I)
26-Sep　　First-Order ODEs(II)
3-Oct　　First-Order ODEs(III)
17-Oct　　Second-Order Linear ODEs (I)
24-Oct　　Second-Order Linear ODEs (II)
31-Oct　　Second-Order Linear ODEs (III)
7-Nov　　Midterm
14-Nov　　Higher Order Linear ODEs(I)
21-Nov　　Higher Order Linear ODEs (II)
28-Nov　　Higher Order Linear ODEs (III)
5-Dec　　 Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions(I)
12-Dec　　 Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions (II)
19-Dec　　 Series Solutions of ODEs. Special Functions (III)
26-Dec　　 Laplace Transforms (I)
2-Jan　　 Laplace Transforms (II)
10-Jan　　Final
